AFAttribute.Name: CorsExposedHeaders
AFAttribute.Description: A comma-separated list of HTTP response headers that browsers are allowed to access

AFAttribute.Name: CorsHeaders
AFAttribute.Description: A comma-separated list of HTTP header keys that are allowed for cross-domain requests

AFAttribute.Name: CorsMethods
AFAttribute.Description: A comma-separated list of HTTP methods (verbs) that are allowed for cross-domain requests

AFAttribute.Name: CorsOrigins
AFAttribute.Description: A comma-separated list of domains from which cross-domain requests may originate

AFAttribute.Name: CorsSupportsCredentials
AFAttribute.Description: Indicates whether or not the browser can send and receive authentication information along with a cross-domain request and response

AFAttribute.Name: DisableWrites
AFAttribute.Description: When set to true, disable PI Web API writes to the PI System

AFAttribute.Name: EnableCSRFDefense
AFAttribute.Description: Indicates whether or not the defense against Cross-Site Request Forgery is enabled

AFAttribute.Name: SearchBoosts
AFAttribute.Description: An array of values used to weight the priority of the associated field when calculating a score

AFAttribute.Name: SearchPointAttributes
AFAttribute.Description: An array of additional PI Point attributes to be stored in the index

AFAttribute.Name: SearchScanInterval
AFAttribute.Description: Time (in seconds) between each incremental crawl

AFAttribute.Name: WebIDType
AFAttribute.Description: String indicating the default Web ID type which the PI Web API will respond with when a request does not specify a preferred type

AFAttribute.Name: XFrameOptions
AFAttribute.Description: Setting for the X-Frame-Options response header
